amendment.description: To require a study regarding establishing a secure facility for high-threat international cargo aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3910 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3910 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S10351-10358; text: CR S10355) To require a study regarding establishing a secure facility for high-threat international cargo aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3910 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3910 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Snowe.
